title: Test
summary: This grouped bar chart has 8 categories of 2014 World Cup Matches on the x axis representing 2 groups: ESPN/ABC, and Univision.
Averaging these 2 groups, the highest category is found for 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC) with a mean value of 13.25.
Followed by Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) with a mean value of 12.35.
The lowest category is observed at Opening match - Brazil vs. Croatia (06/12/14)(Univision & ESPN) that has a mean value of 4.75
showing a difference of 94.4% with the maximum value.

In case of Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN), ESPN/ABC shows more dominance than any other 2014 World Cup Matches and it has the lowest value in Opening match - Brazil vs. Croatia (06/12/14)(Univision & ESPN).
